sect2.title: Contents of Fileutils
sect2.para: Fileutils is a package containing basic file manipulation programs. Including are programs to list directories, create directories, update timestamps, change permissions and so forth.

sect3.title: Program Files
sect3.para: chgrp, chmod, chown, cp, dd, df, dir, dircolors, du, install, ln, ls, mkdir, mkfifo, mknod, mv, rm, rmdir, shred, sync, touch and vdir
